hadiths.text: It was narrated from Bara' bin Azib that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“If this world were to be destroyed, that would be less significant before Allah (SWT) than the unlawful killing of a believer.”

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي قَتْلِ مُسْلِمٍ ظُلْمًا
chapter.eng-name: The Severity Of Killing A Muslim
